settings.title: The Brand
settings.content:
SunsetFashionLA is the place where LA cool meets NYC edgy, Miami fun and sexy, Tulum boho chic, and French Riviera sophisticated and elegant.

Whether you are planning a work meeting, beach day, brunch with your girls, a date, or a night out, we have trendy styles for all occasions which will make you stand out from the crowd and look your best!

settings.left_content:
Born in the heart of LA on Sunset Blvd., SunsetFashionLA brings you the trendiest looks and timeless pieces.

After traveling the world and planning our trips, we couldn't find an online shop with styles for every occasion.

SunsetFashionLA is the place where LA cool meets NYC edgy, Miami fun and sexy, Tulum boho chic, and French Riviera sophisticated and elegant.

Whether you are planning a work meeting, beach day, brunch with your girls, a date, or a night out, we have styles for all occasions which will make you stand out from the crowd and look your best!
settings.right_content: We love getting to know our customers! If you need help picking an outfit, have questions on sizing, shipping and delivery, or have any other question, please contact us by filling out a contact form or clicking a "Chat with us!" button below.
